# uptimekuma_status_page_incident (Resource)

Status page incident resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_status_page" "example" {
  slug      = "example-status"
  title     = "Example Status Page"
  published = true
}

resource "uptimekuma_status_page_incident" "example" {
  status_page_slug = uptimekuma_status_page.example.slug
  title            = "Scheduled Maintenance"
  content          = "We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our services."
  style            = "info"
  pin              = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String) Incident description
- `status_page_slug` (String) Reference to status page slug
- `title` (String) Incident title

### Optional

- `pin` (Boolean) Pin incident to top of status page
- `style` (String) Incident style/severity (e.g., info, warning, danger, primary, light, dark)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Incident ID
